headline: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) Announces US$10 Billion Share Repurchase Amid 12% Weekly Price Dip
summary: On March 10, 2025, Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) announced a 15% increase in its quarterly dividend and a substantial $10 billion share repurchase program. Despite these initiatives aimed at enhancing shareholder value, the company’s stock saw a 12% decline over the past week. This downturn coincided with broader market turmoil due to escalating trade tensions, leading the Nasdaq to enter bear market territory with a 10% decline. The semiconductor sector, including chipmakers like Nvidia...
